name: Skipping Soft Plastics Under Docks
description: A precision casting technique that targets fish hiding in the shadows beneath docks.
steps: Approach dock quietly with wind at your back.
Use underhand skip cast to slide bait beneath the dock.
Let bait fall naturally, then gently twitch once.
Retrieve slowly or let sit depending on strike behavior.
commonMistakes: Casting too hard and bouncing lure off structure.
Skipping with too stiff a rod.
Impatience on the fall — not letting lure sit.
journalPrompt: Describe a moment when you had to wait longer than expected. Did you feel frustration, or anticipation?
tairoGuidance: Let me observe your casting rhythm next time, and I will help you feel where your timing slips. Together, we will soften it.
whisper: Precision is born in silence. The shadow beneath the dock is not darkness — it is potential, waiting for your patience to awaken it.
